short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Measure Your Coffee in a Simple and Quick Way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some people start their day with a cup of Coffee. ☕
For beginners, it is difficult to find the perfect Coffee Ratio. ⚖️
To make a perfect cup of coffee, measure your coffee amount in a simple way!
You just enter water amount in Liters and Click on Measure Coffee Button, Extension will show amount of Coffee you needed.
